articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Qualcomm brings its Snapdragon X chips to mid-range Windows laptops and desktops - TechCrunch
articles.description: Qualcomm's latest chip for PCs, Snapdragon X, announced at the 2025 Consumer Electronics Show, is aimed at the mid-range market.
articles.content:
Qualcomm is making a move for the mid-range PC market with a new system-on-chip.
At the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, Qualcomm unveiled Snapdragon X, the latest chip in its Snapdragon X Se… [+2209 chars]
